What is (are) Prevent diabetes problems: Keep your kidneys healthy ?,"Your kidneys are two bean-shaped organs, each about the size of a fist. They are located just below your rib cage, one on each side of your spine. Every day, your two kidneys filter about 120 to 150 quarts of blood to produ
